summary:
##  Installer, Title Bar & Release Notes UX

###  Installer Flow
- Removed auto-restart flag when launching the installer
- Fixes ghost “Setup” window lingering in Alt-Tab
- Relaunch now happens cleanly from the installer Finish page

###  Title Bar Enhancements
- Added a **chrome-hosted title-bar content slot** for page-specific controls
- Introduced a reusable **Essentials Pivot Title Bar** component
- Wired the title bar into Install Hub, Maintenance, and Processes pages
- Essentials now sets/clears title-bar content on enter/exit and removed the old in-page “Switch views” block

###  Registry Optimizer UX
- Added **Presets** quick-action button that opens a popup selector
- Removed always-visible presets panel from the right column
- Keeps the layout cleaner while preserving fast preset access
- Added popup open/close handlers for reliable state control

###  Release Notes Rendering
- Release notes now flow through a **markdown-aware pipeline**:
  - Normalizes markdown
  - Builds a styled FlowDocument
  - Preserves icon metadata and supports raw markdown copy
- Overlay now renders formatted headings, lists, links, and inline code
- Empty state is based on actual markdown presence
- Replaced flat list layout with a scrollable, formatted view
